verses.verse: ALEPH. Blessed <S%H835><s%> are the undefiled <S%H8549><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%>, who walk <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in the Torah <S%H8451><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
Blessed <S%H835><s%> are they that keep <S%H5341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> his testimonies <S%H5713><s%>, and that seek <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him with the whole heart <S%H3820><s%>.
They also do <S%H6466><s%> <S%H8804><s%> no iniquity <S%H5766><s%>: they walk <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in his ways <S%H1870><s%>.
Thou hast commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> us to keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thy precepts <S%H6490><s%> diligently <S%H3966><s%>.
O that <S%H305><s%> my ways <S%H1870><s%> were directed <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8735><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thy statutes <S%H2706><s%> !
Then shall I not be ashamed <S%H954><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, when I have respect <S%H5027><s%> <S%H8687><s%> unto all thy Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>.

I will praise <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee with uprightness <S%H3476><s%> of heart <S%H3824><s%>, when I shall have learned <S%H3925><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thy righteous <S%H6664><s%> judgments <S%H4941><s%>.
I will keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy statutes <S%H2706><s%>: O forsake <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me not utterly <S%H3966><s%>.
BETH. Wherewithal shall a young man <S%H5288><s%> cleanse <S%H2135><s%> <S%H8762><s%> his way <S%H734><s%>? by taking heed <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thereto according to thy word <S%H1697><s%>.
With my whole heart <S%H3820><s%> have I sought <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee: O let me not wander <S%H7686><s%> <S%H8686><s%> from thy Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>.
Thy word <S%H565><s%> have I hid <S%H6845><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in mine heart <S%H3820><s%>, that I might not sin <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against thee.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8803><s%> art thou, O YY <S%H3068><s%>: teach <S%H3925><s%> <S%H8761><s%> me thy statutes <S%H2706><s%>.
With my lips <S%H8193><s%> have I declared <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8765><s%> all the judgments <S%H4941><s%> of thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>.
I have rejoiced <S%H7797><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> of thy testimonies <S%H5715><s%>, as much as in <S%H5921><s%> all riches <S%H1952><s%>.
I will meditate <S%H7878><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in thy precepts <S%H6490><s%>, and have respect <S%H5027><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto thy ways <S%H734><s%>.
I will delight <S%H8173><s%> <S%H8698><s%> myself in thy statutes <S%H2708><s%>: I will not forget <S%H7911><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy word <S%H1697><s%>.
GIMEL. Deal bountifully <S%H1580><s%> <S%H8798><s%> with thy servant <S%H5650><s%>, that I may live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy word <S%H1697><s%>.
Open <S%H1540><s%> <S%H8761><s%> thou mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, that I may behold <S%H5027><s%> <S%H8686><s%> wondrous things <S%H6381><s%> <S%H8737><s%> out of thy Torah <S%H8451><s%>.
I am a stranger <S%H1616><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>: hide <S%H5641><s%> <S%H8686><s%> not thy Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> from me.
My soul <S%H5315><s%> breaketh <S%H1638><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for the longing <S%H8375><s%> that it hath unto thy judgments <S%H4941><s%> at all times <S%H6256><s%>.
Thou hast rebuked <S%H1605><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the proud <S%H2086><s%> that are cursed <S%H779><s%> <S%H8803><s%>, which do err <S%H7686><s%> <S%H8802><s%> from thy Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>.
Remove <S%H1556><s%> <S%H8798><s%> from me reproach <S%H2781><s%> and contempt <S%H937><s%>; for I have kept <S%H5341><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy testimonies <S%H5713><s%>.

Princes <S%H8269><s%> also did sit <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8738><s%> against me: but thy servant <S%H5650><s%> did meditate <S%H7878><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in thy statutes <S%H2706><s%>.
Thy testimonies <S%H5713><s%> also are my delight <S%H8191><s%> and my counsellors <S%H582><s%> <S%H6098><s%>.
DALETH. My soul <S%H5315><s%> cleaveth <S%H1692><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the dust <S%H6083><s%>: quicken <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8761><s%> thou me according to thy word <S%H1697><s%>.
I have declared <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8765><s%> my ways <S%H1870><s%>, and thou heardest <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me: teach <S%H3925><s%> <S%H8761><s%> me thy statutes <S%H2706><s%>.
Make me to understand <S%H995><s%> <S%H8685><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of thy precepts <S%H6490><s%>: so shall I talk <S%H7878><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of thy wondrous works <S%H6381><s%> <S%H8737><s%>.
My soul <S%H5315><s%> melteth <S%H1811><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for heaviness <S%H8424><s%>: strengthen <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8761><s%> thou me according unto thy word <S%H1697><s%>.
Remove <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8685><s%> from me the way <S%H1870><s%> of lying <S%H8267><s%>: and grant me thy Torah <S%H8451><s%> graciously <S%H2603><s%> <S%H8798><s%>.
I have chosen <S%H977><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of truth <S%H530><s%>: thy judgments <S%H4941><s%> have I laid <S%H7737><s%> <S%H8765><s%> before me.
I have stuck <S%H1692><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto thy testimonies <S%H5715><s%>: O YY <S%H3068><s%>, put me not to shame <S%H954><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.
I will run <S%H7323><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of thy Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>, when thou shalt enlarge <S%H7337><s%> <S%H8686><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%>.
HE. Teach <S%H3384><s%> <S%H8685><s%> me, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, the way <S%H1870><s%> of thy statutes <S%H2706><s%>; and I shall keep <S%H5341><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it unto the end <S%H6118><s%>.

Give me understanding <S%H995><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, and I shall keep <S%H5341><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy Torah <S%H8451><s%>; yea, I shall observe <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it with my whole heart <S%H3820><s%>.
Make me to go <S%H1869><s%> <S%H8685><s%> in the path <S%H5410><s%> of thy Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>; for therein do I delight <S%H2654><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.
Incline <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8685><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> unto thy testimonies <S%H5715><s%>, and not to covetousness <S%H1215><s%>.

Turn away <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8685><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> from beholding <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> vanity <S%H7723><s%>; and quicken <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8761><s%> thou me in thy way <S%H1870><s%>.
Stablish <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8685><s%> thy word <S%H565><s%> unto thy servant <S%H5650><s%>, who is devoted to thy fear <S%H3374><s%>.
Turn away <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8685><s%> my reproach <S%H2781><s%> which I fear <S%H3025><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: for thy judgments <S%H4941><s%> are good <S%H2896><s%>.
Behold, I have longed <S%H8373><s%> <S%H8804><s%> after thy precepts <S%H6490><s%>: quicken <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8761><s%> me in thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.
VAU. Let thy mercies <S%H2617><s%> come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> also unto me, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, even thy salvation <S%H8668><s%>, according to thy word <S%H565><s%>.
So shall I have wherewith <S%H1697><s%> to answer <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him that reproacheth <S%H2778><s%> <S%H8802><s%> me: for I trust <S%H982><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in thy word <S%H1697><s%>.

And take <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8686><s%> not the word <S%H1697><s%> of truth <S%H571><s%> utterly <S%H3966><s%> out of my mouth <S%H6310><s%>; for I have hoped <S%H3176><s%> <S%H8765><s%> in thy judgments <S%H4941><s%>.
So shall I keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy Torah <S%H8451><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5703><s%>.
And I will walk <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8691><s%> at liberty <S%H7342><s%>: for I seek <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy precepts <S%H6490><s%>.
I will speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> of thy testimonies <S%H5713><s%> also before kings <S%H4428><s%>, and will not be ashamed <S%H954><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
And I will delight <S%H8173><s%> <S%H8698><s%> myself in thy Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>, which I have loved <S%H157><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

My hands <S%H3709><s%> also will I lift up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto thy Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>, which I have loved <S%H157><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; and I will meditate <S%H7878><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in thy statutes <S%H2706><s%>.
ZAIN. Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> unto thy servant <S%H5650><s%>, upon which thou hast caused me to hope <S%H3176><s%> <S%H8765><s%>.
This is my comfort <S%H5165><s%> in my affliction <S%H6040><s%>: for thy word <S%H565><s%> hath quickened <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me.
The proud <S%H2086><s%> have had me greatly <S%H3966><s%> in derision <S%H3887><s%> <S%H8689><s%>: yet have I not declined <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from thy Torah <S%H8451><s%>.
I remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy judgments <S%H4941><s%> of old <S%H5769><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>; and have comforted <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8691><s%> myself.
Horror <S%H2152><s%> hath taken hold <S%H270><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon me because of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> that forsake <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thy Torah <S%H8451><s%>.
Thy statutes <S%H2706><s%> have been my songs <S%H2158><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of my pilgrimage <S%H4033><s%>.
I have remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, in the night <S%H3915><s%>, and have kept <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy Torah <S%H8451><s%>.
This I had, because I kept <S%H5341><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy precepts <S%H6490><s%>.
CHETH. Thou art my portion <S%H2506><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>: I have said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that I would keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thy words <S%H1697><s%>.
I intreated <S%H2470><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thy favour <S%H6440><s%> with my whole heart <S%H3820><s%>: be merciful <S%H2603><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto me according to thy word <S%H565><s%>.
I thought <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8765><s%> on my ways <S%H1870><s%>, and turned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> unto thy testimonies <S%H5713><s%>.
I made haste <S%H2363><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and delayed <S%H4102><s%> <S%H8701><s%> not to keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thy Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>.
The bands <S%H2256><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> have robbed <S%H5749><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me: but I have not forgotten <S%H7911><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy Torah <S%H8451><s%>.
At midnight <S%H2676><s%> <S%H3915><s%> I will rise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to give thanks <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8687><s%> unto thee because of thy righteous <S%H6664><s%> judgments <S%H4941><s%>.
I am a companion <S%H2270><s%> of all them that fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee, and of them that keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thy precepts <S%H6490><s%>.
The earth <S%H776><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, is full <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of thy mercy <S%H2617><s%>: teach <S%H3925><s%> <S%H8761><s%> me thy statutes <S%H2706><s%>.
TETH. Thou hast dealt <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> well <S%H2896><s%> with thy servant <S%H5650><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, according unto thy word <S%H1697><s%>.
Teach <S%H3925><s%> <S%H8761><s%> me good <S%H2898><s%> judgment <S%H2940><s%> and knowledge <S%H1847><s%>: for I have believed <S%H539><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thy Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>.
Before I was afflicted <S%H6031><s%> <S%H8799><s%> I went astray <S%H7683><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: but now have I kept <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy word <S%H565><s%>.
Thou art good <S%H2896><s%>, and doest good <S%H2895><s%> <S%H8688><s%>; teach <S%H3925><s%> <S%H8761><s%> me thy statutes <S%H2706><s%>.

The proud <S%H2086><s%> have forged <S%H2950><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a lie <S%H8267><s%> against me: but I will keep <S%H5341><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy precepts <S%H6490><s%> with my whole heart <S%H3820><s%>.
Their heart <S%H3820><s%> is as fat <S%H2954><s%> <S%H8804><s%> as grease <S%H2459><s%>; but I delight <S%H8173><s%> <S%H8773><s%> in thy Torah <S%H8451><s%>.
It is good <S%H2896><s%> for me that I have been afflicted <S%H6031><s%> <S%H8795><s%>; that I might learn <S%H3925><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy statutes <S%H2706><s%>.
The Torah <S%H8451><s%> of thy mouth <S%H6310><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> unto me than thousands <S%H505><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> and silver <S%H3701><s%>.

JOD. Thy hands <S%H3027><s%> have made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me and fashioned <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8787><s%> me: give me understanding <S%H995><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, that I may learn <S%H3925><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>.
They that fear <S%H3373><s%> thee will be glad <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8799><s%> when they see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me; because I have hoped <S%H3176><s%> <S%H8765><s%> in thy word <S%H1697><s%>.

I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, that thy judgments <S%H4941><s%> are right <S%H6664><s%>, and that thou in faithfulness <S%H530><s%> hast afflicted <S%H6031><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me.
Let, I pray thee, thy merciful kindness <S%H2617><s%> be for my comfort <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8763><s%>, according to thy word <S%H565><s%> unto thy servant <S%H5650><s%>.
Let thy tender mercies <S%H7356><s%> come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, that I may live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: for thy Torah <S%H8451><s%> is my delight <S%H8191><s%>.

Let the proud <S%H2086><s%> be ashamed <S%H954><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; for they dealt perversely <S%H5791><s%> <S%H8765><s%> with me without a cause <S%H8267><s%>: but I will meditate <S%H7878><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in thy precepts <S%H6490><s%>.

Let those that fear <S%H3373><s%> thee turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, and those that have known <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8802><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy testimonies <S%H5713><s%>.
Let my heart <S%H3820><s%> be sound <S%H8549><s%> in thy statutes <S%H2706><s%>; that I be not ashamed <S%H954><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
CAPH. My soul <S%H5315><s%> fainteth <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for thy salvation <S%H8668><s%>: but I hope <S%H3176><s%> <S%H8765><s%> in thy word <S%H1697><s%>.
Mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> fail <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for thy word <S%H565><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, When wilt thou comfort <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8762><s%> me?
For I am become like a bottle <S%H4997><s%> in the smoke <S%H7008><s%>; yet do I not forget <S%H7911><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy statutes <S%H2706><s%>.
How many are the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy servant <S%H5650><s%>? when wilt thou execute <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> on them that persecute <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8802><s%> me?
The proud <S%H2086><s%> have digged <S%H3738><s%> <S%H8804><s%> pits <S%H7882><s%> for me, which are not after thy Torah <S%H8451><s%>.
All thy Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> are faithful <S%H530><s%>: they persecute <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me wrongfully <S%H8267><s%>; help <S%H5826><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thou me.
They had almost <S%H4592><s%> consumed <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me upon earth <S%H776><s%>; but I forsook <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not thy precepts <S%H6490><s%>.
Quicken <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8761><s%> me after thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>; so shall I keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%> of thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>.
LAMED. For ever <S%H5769><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, thy word <S%H1697><s%> is settled <S%H5324><s%> <S%H8737><s%> in heaven <S%H8064><s%>.

Thy faithfulness <S%H530><s%> is unto all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>: thou hast established <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8790><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>, and it abideth <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
They continue <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8804><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> according to thine ordinances <S%H4941><s%>: for all are thy servants <S%H5650><s%>.
Unless <S%H3884><s%> thy Torah <S%H8451><s%> had been my delights <S%H8191><s%>, I should then have perished <S%H6><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in mine affliction <S%H6040><s%>.
I will never <S%H5769><s%> forget <S%H7911><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy precepts <S%H6490><s%>: for with them thou hast quickened <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me.
